name: Frontend Application
description: Frontend-focused project â€” SPAs, PWAs, design systems, component libraries

defaultDirectives.dev: Build responsive, accessible UI components. Follow design system tokens. Write component tests and storybook stories.
defaultDirectives.ux-design-expert: Design user-centric interfaces with clear information hierarchy. Create wireframes, prototypes, and design specifications.
defaultDirectives.qa: Test across browsers and devices. Verify accessibility (WCAG AA), performance metrics, and visual regression.
defaultDirectives.pm: Define user journeys, feature requirements, and success metrics. Coordinate with UX for user research insights.
